definition: can't say for sure/maybe
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Let's eat now and maybe we could catch a movie later.
sentences.chinese: 咱們現在就喫，說不定喫完能趕場電影。

sentences.english: Keep your words soft and tender because tomorrow you may have to eat them.
sentences.chinese: 保持言語溫和，說不定明天你就自食其言。

sentences.english: A tenacious auditor might want to make an example out of you.
sentences.chinese: 某個固執的審計員說不定想拿你來殺雞儆猴。

sentences.english: However, if he will not walk, it might be enough to put on usual sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 但，如果說不定不走，用普通的旅遊鞋也沒問題。

sentences.english: Maybe there had even been others during Louise’s pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在露易莎懷孕期間說不定還有別人。

sentences.english: Maybe one day I'll have to beg a meal off you in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 說不定以後我混不下去了到北京還得找你給我口飯喫。

sentences.english: Suddenly, someone said: "Maybe Wang will run away."
sentences.chinese: 說不定王常盈那小子想開溜。

sentences.english: By some good fortune, the universe grants me at least one of those a day.
sentences.chinese: 說不定幸運些，宇宙就會賜予我至少一天那樣的時間。

sentences.english: Every now and then, one of us goes to the kitchen to make coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我們倆人說不定是誰，時不時去廚房沏杯咖啡。

sentences.english: It might be worth giving her a ring and asking if she has any ideas.
sentences.chinese: 給她打個電話問問看，說不定能解決問題。

sentences.english: One of these days, I might get around to marketing it.
sentences.chinese: 說不定我哪天把這個也推向市場呢。

sentences.english: Maybe I will watch that TV show sometime.
sentences.chinese: 說不定我還真會抽空看看那部電視劇。

sentences.english: If other vagrancy were to be recorded, maybe it would be very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 如果別的漫遊他也拍下來的話，說不定也會挺有意思。

sentences.english: You may be able to avoid or delay surgery.
sentences.chinese: 說不定你就能避免或推遲手術。
說不定哪一天我們會發財的。

sentences.english: If the day collapses down, perhaps how many stars can pick?
sentences.chinese: 如果天塌下來，說不定可以撿到幾顆星星？

definition: just in case/if by any chance/contingency
perhaps/maybe
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
this side/here
ought to/should/must
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
if (coming after a conditional clause)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
surname Huan
to pay back/to return
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
in a word/in short/in brief
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
